title: The Danger in Abstracts of Scientific Papers
post: it’s a bit unbelievable that Jull and Freer-Waters are working on this small sample since the 2008 (http://uanews.org/node/22384) and after two years have produced a paper so poor: only microscopical analysis at max 320x (Rogers observations were at max 800x); no chemical analysis (Rogers made many chemical analysis); fiber unidentified! and they can not tel us if the cotton is on or in the threads!
author: domenico

title: The Danger in Abstracts of Scientific Papers
author: B&B
